item.title: Dragon Claws [PI]
item.dc:creator: @chaosplaya09 chaosplaya09
item.description:
@chaosplaya09 wrote:

When ever i change

to

my client goes to the error page and the CMD for the client gives me this.

RS2 user client - release #317 Error: loaderror Connecting to update server 60

here is my code for preload model for d claws.

public byte[] getModel(int Index) { try { File Model = new File("./Raw/"+Index+".dat"); byte[] aByte = new byte[(int)Model.length()]; FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(Model); fis.read(aByte); pushMessage("aByte = ["+aByte+"]!", 0, ""); fis.close(); return aByte; } catch(Exception e) {return null;} }

public void preloadModels() { File file = new File("./Raw/"); File[] fileArray = file.listFiles(); for(int y = 0; y < fileArray.length; y++) { String s = fileArray[y].getName(); byte[] buffer = ReadFile("./Raw/"+s); Model.method460(buffer,Integer.parseInt(getFileNameWithoutExtension(s))); } }

if you need to see my whole client.java here it is.

http://pastebin.com/EwGpkTaG
